.. _all_sky_scan:

**************
All-Sky Search
**************

The following scripts are within the ``pev_photons/all_sky`` directory.

------------
All-Sky Scan
------------

.. code-block:: bash

    python all_sky_scan.py --ncpu *desired_ncpu*

This produces the file ``skymap.npy``, which is a healpy map of the test statistic for a point source at each pixel in the field of view.
